promotions.title: Welcome Bonus
promotions.description: Get 100% bonus on your first deposit up to IDR 1,000,000
promotions.terms: Minimum deposit IDR 50,000. 30x wagering requirement on bonus amount. Bonus valid for 30 days from activation. Maximum bet IDR 200,000 while bonus is active. Bonus amount must be wagered before withdrawal.

promotions.title: Weekend Reload
promotions.description: 50% bonus every weekend for loyal players
promotions.terms: Minimum deposit IDR 100,000. 25x wagering requirement on bonus amount. Valid every Friday 00:00 to Sunday 23:59 WIB. Maximum bet IDR 500,000 while bonus is active. One claim per player per weekend.

promotions.title: Sports Welcome Bonus
promotions.terms: New sportsbook players only. Minimum deposit IDR 100,000. 10x rollover requirement on bonus amount. Minimum odds 1.75. Valid for 30 days after activation.
